EmailTemplate.description: Email to visitor with instructions on how to access
EmailTemplate.name: External Outbound Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Rutland County Council - How to get here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You are scheduled to meet {!Corporate_Visitor__c.Contact_Person__c} on {!Corporate_Visitor__c.00N0Y00000MFOpG} at {!Corporate_Visitor__c.00N0Y00000MFdPZ}. Our main address is:
Rutland County Council Catmose Street Oakham LE15 6HP
Parking is very limited around the main offices and you can find more information from the following link:
https://www.rutland.gov.uk/my-community/parking/council-car-parks/
Please ensure that you have enough time to locate a parking space.
Please come to the main reception and report to customer services
Yours faithfully,
Rutland County Council Catmose, Oakham, Rutland, LE15 6HP t: 01572 722577 e: enquiries@rutland.gov.uk w: www.rutland.gov.uk
